Package goal.tools.errorhandling

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ResourceId
    This is a set of Ids that can be converted into (String) objects throught the Resources#get(ResourceId, String...) call.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Formatter
    Formatter for a Warning.
    GOALBugReport
    A slight variation on the Warning class, GOALBugReport handles the display of GOAL bugs that occurred while running a multi-agent system.
    Resources
    Util class.
    Warning
    Handles warning messages.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WarningStrings
    Collects all warning strings.
